mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sp.ID, sp.NAME, sp.URL, sp.ICON, scf.SORT FROM SYS_COMMON_FUNC scf LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION sp on sp.ID=scf.PERMISSION_ID AND sp.DEL_FLAG='0' WHERE scf.USER_ID=#{personId} ORDER BY scf.SORT ASC

SELECT DISTINCT sp1.ID, sp1.NAME, sp1.URL, sp1.ICON, sp1.SORT, sp2.SORT AS PARENT_SORT FROM SYS_USER_ROLE sur left join SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION srp on srp.ROLE_ID=sur.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION sp1 on sp1.ID=srp.PERMISSION_ID and sp1.DEL_FLAG='0' LEFT JOIN SYS_PERMISSION sp2 on sp1.PARENT_ID=sp2.ID AND sp2.DEL_FLAG='0' WHERE sp1.TYPE='2' AND sp1.IS_SHOW='1' AND sp1.STATUS='0' AND sp1.DEL_FLAG='0' AND sp1.PARENT_ID IS NOT NULL and sur.USER_ID=#{userId}
ORDER BY sp2.SORT ASC, sp1.SORT ASC
